isis.stitle: FRONT NON-DRIVE STEERING AXLE: ROCKWELL - CLEAN AND INSPECT

svcproc.title: REPAIRING OF PARTS

note.para: The repair or reconditioning of front axle components is not allowed. International specifies that damaged or out of specification components be replaced. All major components are heat treated and tempered.

warning.para: The components cannot be bent, welded, heated or repaired in any way without reducing the strength or life of the component, voiding the warranty, and possibly causing an accident which could result in personal injury.

svcproc.para: The following operations are prohibited on front axle components.

step1.para: Welding of or to the steering arms, tie rod arms, the knuckles, the king pins, the axle beams, the tie rod assemblies, the hubs, the drums or the brakes.
Hot or cold bending of the knuckles, steering arms, tie rod arms, ball studs, axle beams or tie rod assemblies.
Drilling out of the holes in the axle beam for the king pins.
Drilling out of the draw key holes in the knuckle.
Spray welding of bearing diameters on the knuckles or in the machined bores.
Milling or machining of any component.

warning.para: If you use cleaning solvents, hot solution tanks or alkaline solutions incorrectly, serious personal injury can occur. To prevent injury, follow the instructions supplied by the manufacturer. Do NOT use gasoline to clean parts. Gasoline can explode.
